verses.verse: The wilderness <WH4057> and the dry land <WH6723> shall be glad <WH7797>; and the desert <WH6160> shall rejoice <WH1523>, and blossom <WH6524> as the rose <WH2261>.

It shall blossom <WH6524> abundantly <WH6524>, and rejoice <WH1523> even with joy <WH1525> and singing <WH7444>; the glory <WH3519> of Lebanon <WH3844> shall be given <WH5414> unto it <WH1926>, the excellency of Carmel <WH3760> and Sharon <WH8289>: they shall see <WH7200> the glory <WH3519> of Jehovah <WH3068>, the excellency <WH1926> of our God <WH430>.
Strengthen <WH2388> ye the weak <WH7504> hands <WH3027>, and confirm <WH553> the feeble <WH3782> knees <WH1290>.

Say <WH559> to them that are of a fearful <WH4116> heart <WH3820>, Be strong <WH2388>, fear <WH3372> not <WH430>: behold, your God will come <WH935> with vengeance <WH5359>, with the recompense <WH1576> of God <WH430>; he will come <WH935> and save you <WH3467>.
Then the eyes <WH5869> of the blind <WH5787> shall be opened <WH6491>, and the ears <WH241> of the deaf <WH2795> shall be unstopped <WH6605>.

Then shall the lame <WH6455> man leap <WH1801> as a hart <WH354>, and the tongue <WH3956> of the dumb <WH483> shall sing <WH7442>; for in the wilderness <WH4057> shall waters <WH4325> break out <WH1234>, and streams <WH5158> in the desert <WH6160>.

And the glowing sand <WH8273> shall become a pool <WH98>, and the thirsty ground <WH6774> springs <WH4002> of water <WH4325>: in the habitation <WH5116> of jackals <WH8577>, where they lay <WH7258>, shall be grass <WH2682> with reeds <WH7070> and rushes <WH1573>.

And a highway <WH4547> shall be there <WH1870>, and a way, and it shall be called <WH7121> The way <WH1870> of holiness <WH6944>; the unclean <WH2931> shall not pass over <WH5674> it <WH1980>; but is shall be for the redeemed: the wayfaring men, yea fools <WH191>, shall not err therein <WH8582>.
No lion <WH738> shall be there <WH6530>, nor shall any ravenous beast <WH2416> go up <WH5927> thereon <WH4672>; they shall not be found there <WH1350>; but the redeemed shall walk there <WH1980>:

and the ransomed <WH6299> of Jehovah <WH3068> shall return <WH7725>, and come <WH935> with singing <WH7440> unto Zion <WH6726>; and everlasting <WH5769> joy <WH8057> shall be upon their heads <WH7218>: they shall obtain <WH5381> gladness <WH8342> and joy <WH8057>, and sorrow <WH3015> and sighing <WH585> shall flee away <WH5127>.
